Senator Daschle said--well, actually, he asked the question. He was  asking the question of the Republican Chair.

He said:

If this reconciliation bill does not find a way to end or       offset its tax cuts in the years beyond 2002--

That is beyond 10 years--

would the bill violate the Byrd rule?
